Brute.description: A heavily armored warrior focused on control and tanking damage.

Ranger.description: A long-range marksman who excels at dealing damage from afar.

Beast.description: A shapeshifter with multiple forms and adaptive abilities.

Redeemer.description: A holy healer who supports allies and can swap life with the fallen.

Confessor.description: A disruptive controller who manipulates and locks down enemies.

Barbarian.description: A risk/reward fighter who grows stronger when wounded.

Burglar.description: A nimble thief with high mobility and evasion.

Berserker.description: A glass cannon who deals massive damage but takes extra harm.

Shaman.description: A versatile utility caster with spirit abilities.

Illusionist.description: A trickster who gambles with chance and creates illusions.

DarkWizard.description: A life-draining mage who heals by dealing damage.

Alchemist.description: A potion master who buffs allies with powerful flask effects.
